MemoryInfobox.description: 'According to Phidias, another hidden symbol would be located on the Statue of Poseidon|Statue of Poseidon.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Lost Tales of Greece'

General_Description: '''The Samian Statue''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra sought out the [[Statue of Poseidon, Samos|statue]] of the god [[Poseidon]] on the [[Island of Triton]] north of [[Samos]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra arrived at the Island of Triton and used Ikaros to spot a massive statue.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Incredible, [[Phidias]] was right. The artist has captured Poseidon in all his magnificence.''
She climbed the statue and made a copy of the symbol on the shaft of the trident.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Got it!''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra recovered the symbol on the statue.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: The symbol on the statue features the emblem seen on the banner of the [[Southern Sporades]], instead of the emblem most often associated with Poseidon, that of a [[trident]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] – [[The Lost Tales of Greece]]''
